title: spur innovation
extract: 1 a pointed device or sharp spiked wheel fixed to the heel of a rider's boot to enable him to urge his horse on. 2 anything serving to urge or encourage. the increase in salary was a spur to their production.
extract_html: 1 a pointed device or sharp spiked wheel fixed to the heel of a rider's boot to enable him to urge his horse on. 2 anything serving to urge or encourage. the increase in salary was a spur to their production.
